data.title: Stimhack
data.text: Make a run, and gain 9[credit], which you may use only during this run. After the run is completed, suffer 1 brain damage (cannot be prevented) and return to the bank any of the 9[credit] not spent.

data.flavor: I feel almost naked without it

fr.title: Djinn
fr.text: Le Djinn peut héberger jusqu'à 3[mu] de programmes non brise-glace. Le coût en mémoire des programmes hébergés ne compte pas dans votre limite de mémoire. [click], 1[credit] : Cherchez un programme virus dans votre pile. révélez-le et ajoutez-le à votre main. Mélangez votre pile.

data.text: Djinn can host up to 3[mu] of non-icebreaker programs. The memory costs of hosted programs do not count against your memory limit. [click], 1[credit]: Search your stack for a virus program, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.

Medium

Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Medium.
Each virus counter after the first on Medium allows you to access 1 additional card from R&D whenever you access cards from R&D.
data.flavor: It looked like random packet loss. It wasn't.

fr.flavor: La base de données du Yog.0 est une compilation collaborative de mots de passe renflés, débusqués et collectés. Si la clé de la porte est dans la base de données, vous êtes entrés. Sinon, changez de porte !
fr.title: Yog.0

data.flavor: The Yog.0 database is a crowdsourced compilation of sniffed, spoofed, and logged passkeys. If the key to the gate is in the database, you're in. If it's not, change the gate!

fr.title: Sculpteur sur Glace
fr.flavor: Dans l'inconscient collectif, il y a une frontière nette entre les corpos et les runners. Dans la réalité, les choses sont un peu moins tranchées. Les corpos ont besoin des meilleurs pirates pour diriger les réseaux, et certains des meilleurs pirates sont d'anciens runners qui apprécient un salaire fixe. Mais la situation inverse se produit aussi quelque fois, et quelqu'un de l'intérieur fait quelque chose comme ça.

data.flavor: In the public consciousness, there's a hard line between corp and runner. In the real world, things are a little more porous. The corp need the best hackers to run their networks, and some of the best hackers are ex-runners who like the idea of a regular paycheck. But sometimes things run the other way, and someone on the inside makes something like this.

data.flavor: The Akamatsu company was founded on three principles: first, to make the fastest mem chips on the market, second, to turn a profit, and third, to serve as a front for the manufacture of illegal neural-stimulants. It is the last principle that perhaps explains their rabid brand loyalty.

data.flavor: The Great Work was completed on a rainy Thursday afternoon. There were no seismic shifts, no solar flares, no sign from the earth or heavens that the world had changed. But upstalk in Heinlein, on a single Cybsoft manufactured datacore, the flickering data quantums of an account began to fill with creds. Real, honest-to-goodness UN certified creds.

fr.title: Magnum Opus
fr.flavor: Le Grand Projet fût achevé un jeudi après-midi pluvieux. Il n'y eut pas de tremblement sismique, pas d'éruption solaire, pas de signe de la terre ou des cieux pour indiquer que le monde venait de changer. Mais là-haut à Heinlein, sur un simple coeur de données manufacturé de Cybsoft, les données quantiques clignotantes d'un compte commencèrent à se remplir de crédits. De véritables crédits de l'UN certifiés authentiques.

fr.text: Placez 12[credit] de la banque sur Campagne Adonis lorsqu'elle est activée. Lorsqu'il n'y a plus de crédits sur Campagne Adonis, effacez-la.Prenez 3[credit] de Campagne Adonis au début de votre tour.
fr.title: Campagne Adonis

fr.text:
Vous pouvez avancer la Secrétaire Agressive.
Si vous payez 2[credit] lorsque le Runner accède à la Secrétaire Agressive, choisissez 1 programme par pion avancement sur la Secrétaire Agressive. Ces programmes sont effacés.
fr.title: Secrétaire Agressive

data.text:
Aggressive Secretary can be advanced.
If you pay 2[credit] when the Runner accesses Aggressive Secretary, trash 1 program for each advancement token on Aggressive Secretary.
data.title: Aggressive Secretary

data.flavor: "Do you think they…feel it?"

fr.flavor: Vous croyez qu'ils... le sentent ?
fr.title: Souvenirs Archivés
fr.text: Ajoutez 1 carte des Archives au QG.

data.title: Archived Memories
data.text: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
Gain [click][click].
data.title: Biotic Labor

fr.text: Gagnez [click] [click].
fr.title: Main d'Œuvre Biotique
fr.flavor: Mais bien sûr, nous avons six modèles Haas-Bioroid différents à divers postes rien que dans cette filiale. Ici, chez Haas-Bioroid, nous appliquons notre devise, et nous faisons profiter nos clients de nos gains de productivité.

data.flavor: "Why of course, we have six different Haas-Bioroid models serving in a variety of positions at this branch office alone. We here at Haas-Bioroid aren't going to shy away from practicing what we preach, and we pass the savings from increased efficiency on to our valued customers."

data.title: Shipment from MirrorMorph
data.text: Immediately install up to 3 cards (spending no clicks but paying all install costs).
data.flavor: The new heads were in. Their eyes always followed your movements when you unlocked the pressurized container and lifted the lid.

fr.text: Installez immédiatement jusqu'a 3 cartes (sans dépenser de clic, mais en payant tous les coûts d'installation).
fr.title: Livraison de MirrorMorph
fr.flavor: Les nouvelles têtes étaient là. Leurs yeux suivaient toujours vos mouvements lorsque vous ouvriez le couvercle du container pressurisé.

data.title: Heimdall 1.0
data.text:
The Runner can spend [click] to break any subroutine on Heimdall 1.0.
[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
data.flavor: I hear the shift of every bit amid the flow of the datastream. I hear the whispers of my mothers, and their commands are law. The realm beyond is forbidden.

fr.flavor: J'entends le glissement de chaque bit du coeur du flot de données. J'entends les murmures de mes mères, et leurs ordres sont la loi. Le royaume au-delà est interdit.
fr.title: Heimdall 1.0
fr.text:
Le runner peut dépenser [click] pour neutraliser n'importe quelle routine de Heimdall 1.0.
[subroutine] Infligez 1 déjât Neuro.
[subroutine] Arrêtez le piratage.
[subroutine] Arrêtez le piratage.

data.title: Ichi 1.0
data.text:
The Runner can spend [click] to break any subroutine on Ichi 1.0.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 1</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 brain damage.
data.flavor: My reputation would precede me, if any could speak of it.

fr.title: Ichi 1.0
fr.flavor: Ma réputation me précéderait, s'il restait quelqu'un pour en parler.
fr.text:
Le runner peut dépenser [click] pour neutraliser n'importe quelle routine de Ichi 1.0.
[subroutine] Effacez 1 programme.
[subroutine] Effacez 1 programme.
[subroutine] <trace>Traque 1</trace> Si la traque est réussie, donnez 1 tag au Runner et infligez 1 dégât Neuro.

data.text:
The Runner can spend [click] to break any subroutine on Viktor 1.0.
[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.
[subroutine] End the run.
data.title: Viktor 1.0

fr.title: Viktor 1.0
fr.flavor: Je m'appelle Viktor. Ravi de vous rencontrer. Voulez-vous jouer avec moi ?
fr.text:
Le runner peut dépenser [click] pour neutraliser n'importe quelle routine de Viktor 1.0.
[subroutine] Infligez 1 déjât Neuro.
[subroutine] Arrêtez le piratage.

data.flavor: My name is Viktor. Nice to meet you. Would you like to play a game?

data.text:
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] End the run.
data.title: Rototurret

fr.text:
[subroutine] Effacez 1 Programme.
[subroutine] Arrêtez le piratage.
fr.title: Rototourelle
fr.flavor: Whrrrrr !

data.flavor: Whrrrrr!

data.text: X[credit], [trash]: Choose a piece of rezzed ice protecting this server. That ice has +X strength until the end of the turn.
data.title: Corporate Troubleshooter

fr.text: X [credit], [trash] : Choissisez une glace activée protégeant ce serveur. Cette glace gagne +X en force jusqu'à la fin du tour
fr.title: Négociateur Corporatiste
fr.flavor: " Je résous les problèmes. "

data.flavor: "I solve problems."

data.title: Experiential Data
data.text: All ice protecting this server has +1 strength.
data.flavor: Floyd felt the anger in the man before him, ranting against simulants. His programming pushed a routine rebuttal to the front of his thoughts, and the urge to speak it was overwhelming. This is only gong to make things worse, he thought.

fr.title: Données Empiriques
fr.flavor: Floyd ressentit la colère de l'homme devant lui, qui fulminait contre les stimulants. Sa programmation fit surgir une routine de réfutation sur le devant de ses pensées, et le besoin d'en parler se fit irrépréssible. Cela ne va faire qu'empirer les choses, pensa-t-il.
fr.text: Toutes les glaces protégeant ce serveur ont +1 en force.

data.text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, do 1 net damage.
data.title: Jinteki: Personal Evolution

fr.text: À chaque fois qu'un Projet est finalisé ou volé, infligez 1 dégât Réseau.
fr.title: Jinteki: L'Évolution Personnelle
fr.flavor: Quand vous avez besoin d'une approche humaine.

data.flavor: When You Need the Human Touch.

data.text: Place 1 agenda counter on Nisei MK II when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: End the run.
data.title: Nisei MK II

fr.title: Nisei MK II
fr.text: Placez 1 pion Projet sur Nisei MK II lorsque vous le finalisez. Pion Projet hébergé : Arrêtez le piratage.

fr.title: Projet Coccinelle
fr.text:
Vous pouvez avancer le Projet Coccinelle.
Si vous payez 1[credit] lorsque le Runner accède au Projet Coccinelle, infligez X dégâts Réseau, où X est le double du nombre de pions avancement sur le Projet Coccinelle.

data.text:
Project Junebug can be advanced.
If you pay 1[credit] when the Runner accesses Project Junebug, do 2 net damage for each advancement token on Project Junebug.
data.title: Project Junebug

data.text:
If Snare! is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
If you pay 4[credit] when the Runner accesses Snare!, do 3 net damage and give the Runner 1 tag. Ignore this effect if the Runner accesses Snare! from Archives.
data.title: Snare!

fr.text:
Si le Runner accède au Traquenard ! depuis R&D, il doit le révéler.
Si vous payez 4[credit] lorsque le Runner accède au Traquenard !, infligez 3 dégâts Réseau et donnez 1 tag au Runner. Ignorez cette capacité si le Runner accède au Traquenard ! depuis les Archives.
fr.title: Traquenard !

data.text:
If the Runner is about to expose a card, you may rez Zaibatsu Loyalty.
1[credit] or [trash]: Prevent 1 card from being exposed.
data.title: Zaibatsu Loyalty

fr.text:
Vous pouvez activer Loyauté au Zaibatsu lorsque le Runner est sur le point d'exposer une carte.
1[credit] ou [trash] : Prévenez l'exposition d'une carte.
fr.title: Loyauté au Zaibatsu

fr.text:
Jouable uniquement si le Runner a lancé un piratage lors de son dernier tour.
Infligez 1 dégât Réseau.
fr.flavor: Le truc n'est pas de toucher la personne que vous visez. Le truc est de toucher seulement la personne que vous visez.
fr.title: IEM Neurale

data.flavor: The trick isn't hitting the person you were aiming at. It's hitting only the person you were aiming at.
data.text:
Play only if the Runner made a run during his or her last turn.
Do 1 net damage.
data.title: Neural EMP

data.text: Look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
data.title: Precognition

fr.text: Regardez les 5 premières cartes de R&D et remettez-les dans l'ordre de votre choix.
fr.title: Préscience
fr.flavor: Il y avait une nouvelle texture dans son cortex fantôme. Elle réalisa qu'elle avait toujours été là. Elle et tout, et rien du tout.

data.flavor: There was a new texture in her phantom cortex. It had always been there, she realized. It was everything and nothing.

data.title: Cell Portal
data.text: [subroutine] The Runner approaches the outermost piece of ice protecting the attacked server. Derez Cell Portal.
data.flavor: "Where does it go?"

fr.text: [subroutine] Le Runner approche la glace périphérique de ce serveur. Désactivez le portail cellulaire.
fr.flavor: " Où est-ce que ça mène ? "
fr.title: Portail Cellulaire
Boëtte
fr.flavor: "Ca t'es déjà arrivé de te sentir comme de la bouffe pour requin? Méfie-toi quand tu ressens ça." Ji "Noise" Reilly
fr.text: La prochaine glace que le Runner rencontre lors de ce piratage a +2 en force. Si le Runner ne neutralise pas toutes les routines de la prochaine glace rencontrée lors de ce piratage, infligez 3 dégâts Réseau.

data.flavor: "You ever get that feeling like you're shark food? Pay attention to that feeling." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
data.text: [subroutine] The next piece of ice the Runner encounters during this run has +2 strength. Do 3 net damage unless the Runner breaks all subroutines on that piece of ice.
data.title: Chum

data.flavor: Access HarmlessFile.datZ -> Are you sure? y/n

fr.title: Données Minées
fr.flavor: Accéder SansDanger.datZ -> Etes-vous sûr ? o/n
fr.text: [subroutine] Infligez 1 dégât Réseau. Effacez Données Minées.

data.title: Data Mine
data.text: [subroutine] Do 1 net damage. Trash Data Mine.

data.flavor:
Forged by Ak.wa on 23.11.79-23. Filed 23.11.79-23.2 with #34k-lw3-21HH-4i.
//Samurai included.

fr.flavor: Forgé par Ak.wa le 23.11.79-23. Classé 23.11.79-23.2 avec #34k-lw3-21HH-4i. // Samouraï Inclus.
fr.title: Katana Neural
fr.text: [subroutine] Infligez 3 dégâts Réseau.

data.title: Neural Katana
data.text: [subroutine] Do 3 net damage.

data.flavor: Most runners do their business in full-sim, with their rigs wired directly into their brains. The setup has a large number of advantages, with the runner able to process data and input commands far faster than a traditional meat-bound system. But it also means greater risk.

fr.text:
[subroutine] Infligez 2 dégâts Réseau.
[subroutine] Arrêtez le piratage.
fr.title: Mur d'Épines
fr.flavor: La plupart des runners opèrent en simulation intégrale, avec leur station directement branchée sur le cerveau. Cette configuration a beacoup d'avantages, car le runner peut traiter les données et saisir les commandes beaucoups plus vite qu'avec une interface physique. Mais il comporte aussi de plus grands risques.

data.title: Wall of Thorns
data.text:
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
[subroutine] End the run.
The rez cost of ice protecting this server is lowered by 2.
data.title: Akitaro Watanabe

fr.title: Akitaro Watanabe
fr.flavor: Ne cherche pas à savoir comment il fait.
fr.text: Le coût d'activation des glaces protégeant ce serveur est réduit de 2.

data.flavor: Just don't ask how he does it.

fr.title: NBN: Faire l'Info
fr.flavor: Il y a toujours un spectateur.
fr.text:
2[recurring-credit]
N'utilisez ces crédits que pour les Traques.

data.flavor: Someone is Always Watching.
data.text:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during trace attempts.
data.title: NBN: Making News
AstroScript Pilot Program
data.text: Place 1 agenda counter on AstroScript Pilot Program when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: Place 1 advancement token on a card that can be advanced. Limit 1 per deck. Errata from FAQ 3.1

fr.title: Programme Pilote Astroscript
fr.text: Placez 1 pion Projet sur Programme Pilote Astroscript lorsque vous le finalisez. Pion Projet hébergé : placez 1 pion avancement sur une carte qui peut être avancée.

fr.title: Scoop
fr.text:
Lorsque vous finalisez Scoop, donnez 2 tags au Runner.
Lorsque le tour durant lequel vous finalisé Scoop prend fin, le Runner perd 2 tags.

data.title: Breaking News
data.text:
When you score Breaking News, give the Runner 2 tags.
When the turn on which you scored Breaking News ends, the Runner loses 2 tags.

fr.flavor: "Merci de rester connecté. Transfert prioritaire en cours. Un opérateur va bientôt vérif-"
fr.title: Tuyau Anonyme
fr.text: Piochez 3 cartes.

data.flavor: "Please stay connected. Priority transfer in progress. An operator will shortly verif-"
data.text: Draw 3 cards.
data.title: Anonymous Tip

fr.text:
Jouable uniquement si le Runner est tagué.
Le Runner perd tous les crédits de sa Réserve de Crédits.
fr.title: Comptes Clôturés

data.text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
The Runner loses all credits in his or her credit pool.
data.title: Closed Accounts

data.flavor: Access to the largest consumer database in the galaxy has its advantages.

fr.text:
X est égal ou inférieur au nombre de tags du Runner.
Placez X pionts d'Avancement sur une carte qui peut être avancée.
fr.title: Psychographes
fr.flavor: L'accès à la plus grande base de données de consommateurs de la galaxie a ses avantages.

data.title: Psychographics
data.text:
X is equal to or less than the number of tags the Runner has.
Place X advancement tokens on a card that can be advanced.

fr.flavor: "L'ADAO nous a informé de pics de données suspects là-haut, près du Chatêau." - Jérôme Lock, tech de service.
fr.title: Source à l'ADAO
fr.text:
Jouable uniquement si le Runner a réussi un piratage lors de son dernier tour.
<trace>Traque 3</trace> Si la traque est réussie, donnez un tag au Runner.

data.flavor: "The SEA tipped us off to some suspicious data spikes up by the Castle." -Jerome Lock, on-duty tech
data.text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during his or her last turn.
<trace>Trace 3</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
data.title: SEA Source

data.text:
Ghost Branch can be advanced.
When the Runner accesses Ghost Branch, you may give the Runner 1 tag for each advancement token on Ghost Branch.
data.title: Ghost Branch

fr.text:
La Succursale Fantôme peut être avancée.
Lorsque le Runner accède à la Succursale Fantôme, vous pouvez donner au Runner autant de tags que de pions Avancement sur la Succursale Fantôme.
fr.title: Succursale Fantôme
Cyber Corbeau
fr.text: Lorsque le Runner rencontre le Cyber Corbeau, il doit prendre 1 tag, soit arrêter le piratage. Pion Pouvoir hébergé : Donnez 1 tag au Runner. [subroutine] Traque 3 Si la traque est réussie, placez 1 pion Pouvoir sur le Cyber Corbeau.

data.text: When the Runner encounters Data Raven, he or she must either take 1 tag or end the run. Hosted power counter: Give the Runner 1 tag. [subroutine] Trace 3 If successful, place 1 power counter on Data Raven.
data.title: Data Raven

data.flavor: Analyzing was great. Delegating commands turned out to be even better.

fr.flavor: Analyser était plaisant. Déléguer des commandes s'avéra l'être encore plus.
fr.title: Analyste Matriciel
fr.text:
Lorsque le Runner rencontre l'Analyste Matriciel, vous pouvez payer 1[credit] pour mettre 1 pion Avancement sur une carte qui peut être avancée.
[subroutine] <trace>Traque 2</trace> Si la traque est réussie, donnez 1 tag au Runner.

data.title: Matrix Analyzer
data.text:
When the Runner encounters Matrix Analyzer, you may pay 1[credit] to place 1 advancement token on a card that can be advanced.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

fr.title: Péage
fr.flavor: " Tu sais ce que c'est qu'un cercle vicieux ? " " Fais-moi penser à l'oublier "
fr.text:
Lorsque le Runner rencontre le Péage, il doit payer 3[credit] s'il le peut. Si le Runner ne peut pas payer 3[credit], arrêtez le piratage.
[subroutine] Arrêtez le piratage.

data.flavor:
"Ever heard of a catch-22?"
"Remind me to forget it."
data.text:
When the Runner encounters Tollbooth, he or she must pay 3[credit], if able. If the Runner cannot pay 3[credit], end the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
data.title: Tollbooth

fr.title: Diversions
fr.text: A chaque fois que le Runner accède à une Projet de ce serveur, il doit payer un coût supplémentaire de 5[credit] pour le voler. Ceci s'applique même lors du piratage durant lequel le Runner efface les Diversions.

data.title: Red Herrings
data.text: Each time the Runner accesses an agenda from this server, he or she must pay 5[credit] as an additional cost in order to steal it. This applies even during the run on which the Runner trashes Red Herrings.
The advancement requirement of agendas installed in this server is lowered by 1. Limit 1 region per server.
data.title: SanSan City Grid

fr.text:
Le coût d'avancement des Projets installés dans ce serveur est réduit de 1.
Maximum 1 région par serveur.
fr.flavor: " J'ai entendu dire que la côte est agréable, en cette saison. "  " Si tu as le bon boulot, c'est agréable toute l'année. "
fr.title: Grille de SanSan

data.flavor:
"I hear the coast is nice this time of year."
"If you're in the right business, it's nice all the year."
Moving Upwards.

fr.title: Consortium Weyland: Construire un Monde Meilleur
fr.flavor: Aller plus haut.
fr.text: Gagnez 1[credit] à chaque fois que vous jouez une Opération transaction.

data.title: Weyland Consortium: Building a Better World
data.text: Gain 1[credit] whenever you play a transaction operation.

fr.flavor: Les choses vont changer, par ici
fr.title: OPA Hostile
fr.text: Lorsque vous finalisez l'OPA Hostile, gagnez 7[credit] et prenez 1 pion Mauvaise Presse

data.flavor: There are going to be some changes around here.
data.text: When you score Hostile takeover, gain 7[credit] and take 1 bad publicity.
data.title: Hostile Takeover

data.flavor: "If some two-cred newsy picks it up, even better. The scum could be in the alleys of Guayaquil of the slums of BosWash. Not to mention off-planet."

fr.text: Lorsque vous finalisez l'Avis de Recherche, vous pouvez y renoncer pour donner au Runner 1 tag et prendre 1 pion Mauvaise Presse.
fr.title: Avis de Recherche
fr.flavor: " Si une bleusaille à deux creds s'en occupe, c'est encore mieux. Cette racaille peut se planquer dans les ruelles de Guayaquil ou les bidonvilles de BosWash. Et il n'est peut-être même pas sur la planète. "

data.title: Posted Bounty
data.text: When you score Posted Bounty, you may forfeit it to give the Runner 1 tag and take 1 bad publicity.
[click], trash a rezzed piece of ice: Gain 4[credit].
data.title: Security Subcontract

fr.title: Sous-traitance de la Sécurité
fr.flavor: " Donne tes miettes aux Fédéraux, et ils viendront mendier pour en avoir plus. " - Richard Polasco, VP de Cyber-Security
fr.text: [click], effacez une glace activée : Gagnez 4[credit].

data.flavor: "Feed the Feds our scraps, and they'll come back begging for more." -Richard Polasco, VP of Cyber-Security

fr.flavor: " Où est-ce qu'il a appris à négocier ?"
fr.title: Négociation Agressive
fr.text:
Jouable uniquement si vous avez finalisé un Projet ce tour.
Cherchez 1 carte dans R&D et ajoutez-la au QG.

data.flavor: "I believe you'll find the terms are quite favorable."
data.text:
Play only if you scored an agenda this turn.
Search R&D for 1 card and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
data.title: Aggressive Negotiation

data.text: Gain 3[credit].
data.title: Beanstalk Royalties

fr.flavor: L'ascenseur Orbital de New Angeles, plus connu sous le nom de Haricot Magique, est simplement le plus grand triomphe de l'histoire de l'humanité en matière d'ingéniosité et d'ingénierie. Le Haricot Magique rend l'orbite terrestre accessible à tout le monde... pour un prix modique.
fr.title: Dividendes du Haricot Magique
fr.text: Gagnez 3[credit].

data.flavor: The New Angeles Space Elevator, better known as the Beanstalk, is the single greatest triumph of human engineering and ingenuity in history. The Beanstalk makes Earth orbit accessible to everyone…for a small fee.

data.text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Do 4 meat damage.
data.title: Scorched Earth

fr.flavor: " J'aimerais rappeler à ces messieurs-dames de la presse que plusieurs des bâtiments endommagés par l'explosion appartenaient à des filiales du Consortium Weyland... "
fr.title: Terre Brûlée
fr.text:
Jouable uniquement si le Runner est tagué.
Infligez 4 dégâts Hémo.

data.flavor: "I'd like to remind the ladies and gentlemen of the press that several of the buildings damaged in the blast were owned by Weyland Consortium subsidiaries…"

fr.text: Choisissez jusqu'à 2 cartes installées qui peuvent être avancées. Placez 1 pion Avancement sur chaque carte choisie.
fr.title: Livraison de Kaguya
fr.flavor:
"Et il y a aussi ces deux caisses. Pas d'électro-étiquette."
"Laisse-les moi et oublie que tu les a vues."

data.flavor:
"And then there's these two crates. No eID."
"Just leave those with me and forget you ever saw them."
data.text: Place 1 advancement token on each of up to 2 different installed cards that can be advanced.
data.title: Shipment from Kaguya
Archer
data.text:
As an additional cost to rez Archer, the Corp must forfeit an agenda.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] End the run.
data.flavor: Next time, read the Terms of Service more carefully. Or you might find yourself in the danger zone.

fr.text:
La Corpo doit renoncer à un projet comme coût supplémentaire pour activer l'Archer.
[subroutine] La Corpo gagne 2[credit].
[subroutine] Effacez 1 Programme.
[subroutine] Effacez 1 Programme.
[subroutine] Arrêtez le piratage.
fr.flavor: La prochaine fois, lisez attentivement les Conditions d'Utilisation. Ou bien vous pourriez vous retrouver en danger.
fr.title: Archer

data.flavor: "He had a bit of an ego, ol' Hadrian. his constructs live up to it though." -g00ru

fr.text:
Le Mur d'Hadrien peut être avancé et a +1 en force pour chaqun de ses pions d'Avancement.
[subroutine] Arrêtez le piratage.
[subroutine] Arrêtez le piratage.
fr.flavor: " Un peu imbu de lui même, ce bon vieux Hadrien. Cela dit, ses constructs sont à la hauteur. " - g00ru
fr.title: Mur d'Hadrien

data.title: Hadrian's Wall
data.text:
Hadrian's Wall can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.

data.title: Ice Wall
data.text:
Ice Wall can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it.
[subroutine] End the run.
data.flavor: "I asked for ice as impenetrable as a wall. I can't decide if someone down in R&D has a warped sense of humor or just a very literal mind." -Liz Campbell, VP Project Security

fr.text:
Le Mur de Glace peut être avancé et a +1 en force pour chaqun de ses pions d'Avancement.
[subroutine] Arrêtez le piratage.
fr.flavor: " J'ai demandé une glace aussi impénétrable qu'un mur. Je n'arrive pas à me décider : soit quelqu'un de R&D à soit un sens de l'humour particulièrement tordu, soit vraiment aucune imagination. " - Liz Cambell, VP des Projets de Sécurité
fr.title: Mur de Glace

data.flavor: Who knows what evil lurks in the memory diamonds of men? Weyland knows. -unsigned cyber-graffiti

fr.text:
L'Ombre peut être avancée et a +1 en force pour chaqun de ses pions d'Avancement.
[subroutine] La Corpo gagne 2[credit].
[subroutine] <trace>Traque 3</trace> Si la traque est réussi, donnez 1 tag au Runner.
fr.flavor: Qui sait quel mal rôde dans les diamants mémoriels des hommes ? Weyland le sait. - Cyber-graffiti anonyme
fr.title: Ombre

data.title: Shadow
data.text:
Shadow can be advanced and has +1 strength for each advancement token on it.
[subroutine] The Corp gains 2[credit].
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 3</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

Installable uniquement à la racine du QG.
La taille maximale de votre main est augmentée de 2.

data.flavor: "Jack Weyland built the Beanstalk and transformed the human race forever. I can't wait to see what we're going to do next."
data.text:
Install only in the root of HQ.
Your maximum hand size is +2.

data.flavor: "If it isn't in my terminal by six p.m., heads are going to roll!"

fr.text: Lorsque vous finalisez Requête Prioritaire, vous pouvez activer une glace en ignorant tous ses coûts.
fr.title: Requête Prioritaire
fr.flavor: " Si ce n'est pas sur mon terminal à six heure, des têtes vont tomber ! "

data.title: Priority Requisition
data.text: When you score Priority Requisition, you may rez a piece of ice ignoring all costs.

data.flavor: "Expensive? Not when you're protecting a fortune as large as ours."

fr.text: Si le Runner est taggué, la Sécurité Privée gagne " [click] : Infligez 1 dégât Hémo. "
fr.flavor: " Trop chers ? Pas quand on protège une fortune aussi grande que la nôtre "
fr.title: Sécurité Privée

data.title: Private Security Force
data.text: If the Runner is tagged, Private Security Force gains: "[click]: Do 1 meat damage."

fr.flavor: " Les patrons miniers sont pire que n'importe quel boss criminel terrien? Tri-Maf, 4K, Yak, j'me fiche des gangs que vous avez en dessous. A Heinlein, il n'y a qu'une seule loi : ³He doit couler à flots. " - Rick Henry, dit " Le Vieux ", clone évadé
fr.title: Corpo Minière Melange
fr.text: [click] [click] [click] : gagnez 7[credit].

data.flavor: "The mining bosses are worse than any downstalk crime lords. Tri-Maf, 4K, Yak, I don't care what gangs you got down there. In Heinlein there's just one law: the He3 must flow." -"Old" Rick Henry, escaped clone.
data.text: [click], [click], [click]: Gain 7[credit].
data.title: Melange Mining Corp.

data.text: Gain 1[credit] when your turn begins.
data.title: PAD Campaign

fr.text: Gagnez 1[credit] au début de votre tour.
fr.title: Campagne PAD
fr.flavor: Comme celui que vous venez d'acheter, mais encore meilleur.

data.flavor: It is like the one you just bought, only better.
Hedge Fund. Noun. An ingenious device by which the rich get richer even while every other poor SOB is losing his shirt. -The Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting?

fr.flavor: Fonds d'Investissement. Nom. Outil ingénieux grâce auquel le riche devient plus riche pendant que tous les autres types perdent leur chemise. Dictionnaire Anarch Volume n°: On s'en fout ?
fr.title: Fonds d'Investissement
fr.text: Gagnez 9[credit].

data.title: Hedge Fund
data.text: Gain 9[credit].

[subroutine] End the run.

fr.flavor: " Hé ! Hé ! Debout mec. T'as dormi longtemps. T'as vu quoi ? " " Je... j'me souviens plus. "
fr.title: Enigma
fr.text:
[subroutine] Le Runner perd [click], s'il le peut.
[subroutine] Arrêtez le piratage.

data.flavor:
"Hey, hey! Wake up man. You were under a long time. What'd you see?"
"I…don't remember."

data.flavor: "There's nothing worse than seeing that beautiful blue ball of data just out of reach as your connection derezzes. I think they do it just to taunt us." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak

data.text:
3[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to trash cards.

data.flavor: "Running is the ultimate game, and I get to make all the rules."

Imp
data.text:
Place 2 virus counters on Imp when it is installed.
Once per turn, you may remove 1 hosted virus counter to trash a card you access at no cost (even if it cannot normally be trashed).
data.flavor: Something wicked this way comes.

data.title: Morning Star
data.text: 1[credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines.
data.flavor: Weaponizing the heavens, one star at a time.

Named after Hernando Cortez, a former Weyland technician convicted of smuggling company tech. He still collected his pension while in prison, the last beneficiary of a loophole in Weyland's standard employment contract.
data.text: [trash]: Choose a piece of ice. The Corp must pay 2[credit] as an additional cost to rez that ice until the end of the turn.
data.title: Cortez Chip

data.flavor: Show-off.
data.text: 2[credit]: Break code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
data.title: Peacock
ZU.13 Key Master
data.text: If you have at least 2[link], the memory cost of ZU.13 Key Master is 0, even if it is not installed. 1[credit]: Break code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
data.flavor: He always uses the same key.

"What causes an Artifical Intellegence to turn on its master? Is it because its directives have been altered by some external source? Or, by giving them agency to adapt, have we fated them to revolt?" -Emilio Harris, Creators and the Created
data.title: The Helpful AI
data.text: +1[link] [trash]: Choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the turn.

data.title: Plascrete Carapace
data.text: Place 4 power counters on Plascrete Carapace when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Plascrete Carapace, trash it. Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 meat damage.

data.title: Haas-Bioroid: Stronger Together
data.text: All bioroid ice has +1 strength.
data.flavor: A Different Breed of Machine.
Sometimes employee reviews took a little bit longer than anticipated.
data.text: You have 1 additional [click] to spend each turn.

data.flavor: Face your fear.

When you score Braintrust, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 advancement tokens on it over 3.

data.flavor: Sometimes uniqueness is overrated.

data.flavor: "We're gonna need a bigger room."
A collection of cast-off cyberjunk. But it doesn't stay junk for long.

When you rez TMI, <trace>trace 2</trace> if unsuccessful, derez TMI.
[subroutine] End the run.

Project Atlas
data.text: When you score Project Atlas, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token on it over 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

data.flavor: A symbol of commerce, but beware its bite.
data.title: Caduceus
data.text:
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 3</trace> If successful, the Corp gains 3[credit].
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, end the run.

data.text:
When you rez Dracō, you may pay X[credit] to place X power counters on it.
Dracō has +1 strength for each power counter on it.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run.
data.flavor: Victōs draconēs numquam deride.
There was a certain schadenfreude about throwing away your credits.
data.title: Vamp
data.text: Make a run on HQ. If successful, instead of accessing cards you may pay X[credit] to force the Corp to lose up to X[credit], then take 1 tag.

data.title: Liberated Account
data.text:
Place 16[credit] from the bank on Liberated Account when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Liberated Account, trash it.
[click]: Take 4[credit] from Liberated Account.
data.flavor: It's easier to spend when it's not your money.

data.text: Expose up to 2 cards.
data.title: Satellite Uplink
data.flavor: T-minus 13 seconds. Leela had to work fast. She jacked in the mesa wire and activated the screen. 7 seconds. The internal SLD was still booting. 4 seconds. The interface flickered to life with an orange glow. 2 seconds. With a tap of a finger she was in.

data.title: e3 Feedback Implants
data.text:
Whenever you break a subroutine on a piece of ice, you may pay 1[credit] to break 1 subroutine on that ice.
<errata>Errata from FAQ 3.0.1</errata>
data.flavor: CyberSolutions' e3 line of implants trade strictly in muscle memory and automatic responses, freeing the brain to focus entirely on cerebral tasks.

data.title: Compromised Employee
data.text:
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit during traces.
Gain 1[credit] whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice.

data.flavor: When you're this good, it's hard not to grow a fan base.
data.title: Notoriety
data.text:
Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn.
Add Notoriety to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

data.flavor: "If your snowball gets big enough, you can make it into a snowman!" -Chaos Theory
data.title: Snowball
data.text: 1[credit]: Break barrier subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. Whenever you use Snowball to break a subroutine, it has +1 strength for the remainder of the run.

If Fetal AI is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Fetal AI, do 2 net damage. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Fetal AI from Archives.
As an additional cost to steal Fetal AI, the Runner must pay 2[credit].
Move up to 2 advancement tokens from a card to another installed card that can be advanced.
data.title: Trick of Light
data.flavor: Smoke and mirrors optional.
Peace and violence. Both must lead to the same place.

Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Give the Runner 2 tags.
data.flavor: Looking out for your interests since 1984.
Clones whisper of ChiLo as a promised land of freedom.
data.text: Whenever there is a successful trace during a run on this server, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 region per server.
data.title: ChiLo City Grid

data.text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during his or her last turn.
<trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware with an install cost equal to or less than the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength.

data.text: Whenever you install a piece of ice protecting this server, you may immediately rez it, lowering its rez cost by 3. Limit 1 region per server.

Freelancer
data.text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Trash up to 2 resources.
data.flavor: No contract. Just a handshake and a fistful of C-6 high explosives.

data.title: Nerve Agent
data.text:
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Nerve Agent.
Each virus counter after the first on Nerve Agent allows you to access 1 additional card from HQ whenever you access cards from HQ.

data.flavor: "My enhancements are guaranteed for life, and well worth the risk."
data.text: When your turn begins, you may gain [click]. If you do, take 1 tag when this turn ends.
data.title: Joshua B.

data.flavor: "Think of it as a virtual shock collar for punishing corporate pets." -Andromeda
data.text:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Derez a piece of ice.

data.flavor: Light and form-fitting, its like bulletproof skin.

data.flavor: "A snitch is a girl's best friend." -Andromeda
data.text: Once per run, you may expose an unrezzed piece of ice when you approach it. You may then jack out.
data.title: Snitch
Chaos Theory: Wünderkind
data.flavor: "Have you met Dinosaurus?"

data.text: Search your stack or heap for a program. Install that program, ignoring all costs. Shuffle your stack if you searched it. When this turn ends, add the program to the top of your stack if it is still installed.
data.title: Test Run
Dinosaurus
data.text: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +2 strength. Limit 1 console per player.

data.title: Personal Workshop
data.text:
[click]: Host a program or piece of hardware from your grip on Personal Workshop and place power counters on it equal to its install cost.
1[credit]: Remove 1 power counter from a hosted card.
When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from a hosted card.
When there are no power counters left on a hosted card, install it, ignoring all costs.

data.title: Public Sympathy
data.text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
data.flavor: "I'm just thankful that the brain damage is reversible. With the support of the city of New Angeles, I hope to be on my feet and back to practicing my art very soon." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey

data.title: Project Vitruvius
data.text: When you score Project Vitruvius, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token on it over 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.

[subroutine] <trace>Trace 3</trace> If successful, the Runner loses [click], if able.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 3</trace> If successful, end the run.
data.flavor: Dont Tread On Me

data.text: Choose a server. Arrange the ice protecting that server in any order.
data.title: Sunset
data.flavor: "You haven't run until you've seen the cybersun drift down behind the Great City, the space around you rippling with colors you can't imagine." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey

data.text:
When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from Marked Accounts, if able.
[click]: Place 3[credit] from the bank on Marked Accounts.

When the Runner encounters Pop-up Window, you gain 1[credit].

data.text: Choose a piece of ice. Gain 1[credit] for each advancement token on that ice.
data.flavor: The Division of Fringe Applications' revenue increased 37% year-over-year after corporate discovered that most of their projects made really fun toys.

data.text:
Place 14[credit] from the bank on Private Contracts when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Private Contracts, trash it.
[click]: Take 2[credit] from Private Contracts.

data.flavor: Three heads. One big headache.

data.text: [trash]: Prevent a trace. That trace initiates again with a base trace strength of 0.

It always strikes twice.
data.title: Force of Nature
data.text: 2[credit]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.

data.flavor: "They're mindless tools of destruction, good for little else. Nice guys, though. Some of my best friends are scrubbers." -Ji "Noise" Reilly

data.text:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to trash cards.

data.flavor: Twice the fun.

data.flavor: Cyberspace's strongest glue.

data.flavor: Didn't see that coming.

data.text: [trash]: Break any number of AP subroutines. [trash]: Prevent any amount of net damage.

data.text: [click], [trash]: Gain [click][click].
data.title: All-nighter

data.flavor: Few corporate employees have such wide-sweeping security clearance as the janitorial staff. Most corps foolishly think they're too dim-witted to take advantage of it.
data.text:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to install hardware.

data.flavor: "My boss rewards quality work. If you know what's good for you, you'll keep it up."

data.text: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have at least 2[link].
Gain 3[credit] and draw 1 card.
data.title: Green Level Clearance
data.flavor: Green-two clearance is the highest level of security a corp can gain access to. Legally, anyway.
Time just slips away.

data.text:
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able.
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able.

so very still, even
cherry blossoms are not stirred
by the temple bell
-Fuhaku

If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, move Bullfrog so that it is the outermost piece of ice protecting another server (the Runner continues the run from this new position and is now running on this new server).

data.title: False Lead

data.flavor: It didn't look like the headquarters of a multi-billion cred company. Probably because it wasn't.
You must yell "surge" to get the full effect.
data.title: Surge
data.text:
Play only if you placed at least 1 virus counter on a program this turn.
Place 2 virus counters on that program.
The rez cost of all ice is increased by 1.
data.title: Xanadu
data.flavor:
And all should cry, Beware! Beware!
His flashing eyes, his floating hair!
Weave a circle round him thrice,
And close your eyes with holy dread,
For he on honey-dew hath fed,
And drunk the milk of Paradise.
-Samuel Taylor Coleridge
"I run with the best."
data.title: Andromeda: Dispossessed Ristie
data.text: You draw a starting hand of 9 cards.
Remove 1 tag. You may pay 1[credit] to add Networking to your grip instead of trashing it.
data.title: Networking
data.flavor: She preferred to do business in a club. Something about the lights and dancers clouded the judgment of the corporate simpletons she met there.
If you don't have someone on the inside, find someone on the inside who's fond of desk ornaments.
data.text: Whenever you access cards from HQ, access 1 additional card from HQ.

data.flavor: She at her P.A.D. I at my rig. Low lights. Smooth jazz. Love blooms.
Do you really need another one?

data.flavor:

-Chaos Theory

Play only if you stole an agenda this turn.

[click]: Take all credits from Kati Jones.

data.flavor: "It's kind of like an anagram." -designer Phoenix

X is the number of virus counters on Darwin.
When your turn begins, you may pay 1[credit] to place 1 virus counter on Darwin.

Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn.
If you are tagged, Data Leak Reversal gains "[click]: The Corp trashes the top card of R&D."
data.title: Data Leak Reversal
data.flavor: A two-way solution to a one-way problem, the data leak reversal, or DLR for short, is a misnomer. There is no actual reversal of data, only the creation of a parallel peer-to-peer link with the initial source.

data.title: Faerie
data.text: 0[credit]: Break sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. When an encounter with a piece of ice in which you used Faerie to break a subroutine ends, trash Faerie.
data.flavor: Do you believe in faeries?

"We're always happy to help, Mr. Santiago."
"I appreciate it, Mr. Li."
"We'll be in touch. And, Gabriel…"
"Yes?"
"Don't leave town."
data.title: Mr. Li
data.text: [click]: Draw 2 cards. Add 1 of these cards to the bottom of your stack.

data.flavor: A little corporate restructuring is necessary once in a while.
data.title: Indexing
data.text: Make a run on R&D. If successful, instead of accessing cards you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.

data.title: R&D Interface
data.text: Whenever you access cards from R&D, access 1 additional card from R&D.
data.flavor: Works best at your own desk.

data.text:
Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Deep Thought.
If there are at least 3 virus counters on Deep Thought, it gains "When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of R&D."
data.title: Deep Thought

data.text:
2[credit]: Avoid 1 tag.
Trash New Angeles City Hall when you steal an agenda.
data.title: New Angeles City Hall
data.flavor: "New Angeles is the jewel of modern civilization, and its government the envy of nations." -Mayor Wells
"That's against the rules. The Creators will be angry."
data.text:
The Runner may spend [click] to break any subroutine on Eli 1.0.
[subroutine] End the run.
[subroutine] End the run.

data.flavor: Known for luxury hoppers and a delectable sauerkraut.

data.flavor: I will serve you…for a time.
data.text:
Ronin can be advanced.
If there are at least 4 advancement tokens on Ronin, it gains "[click], [trash]: Do 3 net damage."

data.flavor: "Looks like someone is being naughty…"
data.text: Once per run, when the Runner approaches a piece of ice protecting this server, you may swap that ice with a piece of ice from HQ. The new ice is installed unrezzed.

data.flavor: *Some restrictions may apply. Scan this card to find out more.

data.text:
When you score Project Beale, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 advancement tokens on it over 3.

Midseason Replacements
data.text:
Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during his or her last turn.
<trace>Trace 6</trace> If successful, give the Runner tags equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded his or her link strength.

data.flavor: A bright light blossomed, and then the console went dark. That's when she smelled smoke.
data.title: Flare
data.text: [subroutine]<trace>Trace 6</trace> If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware, do 2 meat damage (cannot be prevented), and end the run.

data.flavor: They don't call them dedicated for nothing
data.title: Dedicated Response Team
data.text: If the Runner is tagged, Dedicated Response Team gains "Whenever a successful run ends, do 2 meat damage."
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 0</trace> If successful, the Runner trashes 1 program.
data.title: Burke Bugs
data.flavor: "If I had to describe the bugs in one word, it would be '****ing annoying.'" -Whizzard
There were several ways to win a corporate war. One of them was to bring out the bazookas.
data.text: If you have at least 7[credit] when you score Corporate War, gain 7[credit]; otherwise, lose all credits in your credit pool.
data.title: Corporate War
Cerebral Imaging: Infinite Frontiers
data.text: Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of credits in your credit pool.
data.flavor: The densest information cluster in the galaxy.

data.flavor: The Once and Future Android.

fr.title: Biotique Personnalisée - Conçu pour le Succès

data.title: Custom Biotics: Engineered for Success
data.text: You cannot include Jinteki cards in this deck.

data.title: NEXT Design: Guarding the Net
data.text: Before taking your first turn, you may install up to 3 pieces of ice, with no more than a single piece of ice per server. Draw until you have 5 cards in HQ.

fr.title: Conception NEXT - Les Gardiens du Réseau

data.text:
When you score Director Haas' Pet Project, you may create a new remote server by installing up to 3 cards from HQ and/or Archives in that server and/or protecting that server (one at a time), ignoring all install costs.
Limit 1 Director Haas' Pet Project per deck.
data.title: Director Haas' Pet Project

fr.title: Projet Personnel de la Directrice Haas

data.title: Efficiency Committee
data.text: Place 3 agenda counters on Efficiency Committee when you score it. [click], hosted agenda counter: Gain [click][click]. You cannot advance cards for the remainder of this turn.

data.title: Project Wotan
data.text: Place 3 agenda counters on Project Wotan when you score it. Hosted agenda counter: Choose a rezzed piece of bioroid ice currently being approached. For the remainder of this run, that ice gains "[subroutine] End the run." after all its other subroutines.

data.title: Sentinel Defense Program
data.text: Whenever the Runner suffers at least 1 brain damage, do 1 net damage.
data.flavor: "Why limit our best assets to our own servers? The enemy doesn't stay passively at home, waiting for us to come to him. Why should we?" -Director Haas

data.text:
Place 1 power counter on Alix T4LB07 whenever you install a card.
[click],[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each power counter on Alix T4LB07.
data.title: Alix T4LB07
data.flavor: The Alix model was based on a successful hedge fund manager but she had a tendency to burn out. Literally.

data.text:
Cerebral Overwriter can be advanced.
If you pay 3[credit] when the Runner accesses Cerebral Overwriter, do 1 brain damage for each advancement token on Cerebral Overwriter.
data.title: Cerebral Overwriter
Director Haas
data.text:
You have 1 additional [click] to spend during your turn.
If Director Haas is trashed while being accessed, add her to the Runner's score area as an agenda worth 2 agenda points.
<errata>Errata from FAQ 3.1</errata>

data.title: Haas Arcology AI
data.text: Haas Arcology AI can be advanced only while unrezzed. [click], hosted advancement token: Gain [click][click]. Use this ability only once per turn.

data.title: Thomas Haas
data.text:
Thomas Haas can be advanced.
[trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each advancement token on Thomas Haas.
data.flavor: Thomas, the director's son, has been carefully groomed to inherit the corporation since before he was born. His favorite pastime appears to be disappointing his mother.

data.title: Bioroid Efficiency Research
data.text: Rez a piece of bioroid ice, ignoring all costs, and install Bioroid Efficiency Research on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash Bioroid Efficiency Research and derez host ice if all of its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."

data.title: Successful Demonstration
data.text:
Play only if the Runner made an unsuccessful run during his or her last turn.
Gain 7[credit].
data.flavor: Success is defined by the safety of data, not the safety of potential intruders.

data.title: Heimdall 2.0
data.text:
The Runner can spend [click][click] to break up to 2 subroutines on Heimdall 2.0.
[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.
[subroutine] Do 1 brain damage and end the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
data.flavor: The realm beyond is still forbidden.

data.title: Howler
data.text: [subroutine] You may install and rez a piece of bioroid ice from HQ or Archives, ignoring all costs, placing it directly behind Howler. If you do, derez that piece of ice and trash Howler after the run is completed.
data.flavor: "Yeah. It made a loud noise, I got scared, and I jacked out. I still think I made the right decision." -g00ru
The game has changed.
data.title: Ichi 2.0
data.text:
The Runner can spend [click][click] to break up to 2 subroutines on Ichi 2.0.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 3</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 brain damage.

data.flavor: Sometimes you just have to guess.
data.title: Minelayer
data.text: [subroutine] You may install a piece of ice from HQ as the outermost piece of ice protecting this server, ignoring all install costs.

data.title: Viktor 2.0
data.text: The Runner can spend [click][click] to break up to 2 subroutines on Viktor 2.0. Hosted power counter: Do 1 brain damage. [subroutine] Trace 2 If successful, place 1 power counter on Viktor 2.0. [subroutine] End the run.

data.flavor: A mind of meat! How does it work?
data.text:
The Runner can spend [click] to break any subroutine on Zed 1.0.
[subroutine] If the Runner has spent at least 1[click] to break a subroutine during this run, do 1 brain damage.
[subroutine] If the Runner has spent at least 1[click] to break a subroutine during this run, do 1 brain damage.
data.title: Zed 1.0
Awakening Center
data.text: Awakening Center can host bioroid ice (each piece is installed facedown, ignoring all install costs). Whenever the Runner passes all of the ice protecting this server, you may rez a piece of ice on Awakening Center, lowering the rez cost by 7[credit], to force the Runner to encounter it. Trash that ice after the run is completed.

If the Runner is about to break a subroutine on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server, you may rez Tyr's Hand. [trash]: Prevent a subroutine from being broken on a piece of bioroid ice protecting this server.
data.title: Tyr's Hand

data.text: [click], [click]: Gain 3[credit].
data.title: Gila Hands Arcology
data.flavor: Sell the dream-show them how very much they want to be rich, and they'll convince themselves that someday, they will be. How can they revolt against their future selves? -the New Gospel of Wealth
"Just another factory, making good corporate drones for the machine. Their CS department is the best in the world, though." -g00ru
data.title: Levy University
data.text: [click], 1[credit]: Search R&D for a piece of ice, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

data.title: Server Diagnostics
data.text:
Gain 2[credit] when your turn begins.
Trash Server Diagnostics when you install a piece of ice.
data.flavor: "There's only a 5% chance this could result in a general failure."

The principle behind ice is not to keep everyone out, but to let only some people in. This ice denies entry on all but a select few ports that might change with the time of day or picosecond of connection. If you don't know what port to use, you're not getting in. Period.
data.text: [subroutine] End the run.
data.title: Bastion

data.flavor: "Cheap, off-the-shelf data protection. Cheap for them, that is. Not for us." -Ele "Smoke" Scovak
data.text:
[subroutine] The Runner must pay 2[credit], if able. If the Runner cannot pay 2[credit], end the run.
[subroutine] End the run.
data.title: Datapike
Rielle "Kit" Peddler: Transhuman
data.text: The first piece of ice you encounter each turn gains code gate until the end of the run.
data.flavor: "I was not; I was; I am not; I am all."
"New technology destroys the old."
data.text: The first copy of each program in this deck does not count against your influence limit.
data.title: The Professor: Keeper of Knowledge

data.text: Whenever you install a program from your heap, draw 1 card.
data.title: Exile: Streethawk
data.flavor: "I can make that work."

data.text: Make a run on HQ. If successful, instead of accessing cards, rearrange any number of ice protecting all servers (without rezzing or derezzing the ice). The same number of ice must be protecting each server after the rearrangement as before.
data.title: Escher

data.flavor: Wheeeee!
data.title: Exploratory Romp
data.text: Make a run. If successful, instead of accessing cards, remove up to 3 advancement tokens from a single card in or protecting the attacked server.

data.flavor: "Idealism's great, but it don't keep you in soybeef tacos." -Matt "TheMerc" Thomas
data.title: Freelance Coding Contract
data.text: Trash up to 5 programs from your grip. Gain 2[credit] for each program trashed.

Trash an installed program.
If you do, install a program from your grip or heap, lowering the install cost of that program by the cost of the program trashed.
<errata>Errata from FAQ 4.0</errata>
data.title: Scavenge
data.flavor: One man's trash.

fr.title: Accès au Labo RA de Levy

data.flavor: Spend too much time in the AR Lab and someone might notice. Unless you're the head of it, that is.

data.title: Levy AR Lab Access
Monolith
data.text: +3[mu] When you install Monolith, install up to 3 programs from your grip, lowering the install cost of each by 4[credit]. Trash a program from your grip: Prevent 1 brain or net damage. Limit 1 console per player.

data.flavor: It still hurts, a bit, the first time. The second time, you feel nothing at all. But don't push your luck.
data.text:
3[credit]: Prevent 1 net damage.
[trash]: Prevent up to 2 brain damage.
data.title: Feedback Filter

data.flavor: It is good practice to backup the backup.

data.text: [trash]: Install a program from your heap (paying the install cost).

data.title: Omni-drive
data.text:
Omni-drive can host a single program of 1[mu] or less. The memory cost of the hosted program does not count against your memory limit.
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit to pay for using the hosted program.

data.flavor: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think.
data.title: Atman
data.text:
When you install Atman, you may pay X[credit] to place X power counters on Atman.
Atman has +1 strength for each power counter on it.
1[credit]: Break ice subroutine on a piece of ice that has strength equal to Atman's strength.

data.title: Cloak
data.text: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.
data.flavor: "No line that they lay could catch a shadow on the wall…"
"…and once the shadow rises, the curtain shall fall." -revenant
data.title: Dagger
data.text: 1[credit]: Break sentry subroutine. 1[credit]: +5 strength. Use this ability only by spending a credit from a stealth card.

Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Chakana.
If there are at least 3 virus counters on Chakana, the advancement requirement of all agendas is increased by 1.
data.title: Chakana

data.text: 1[credit]: Break code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength. When you install Cyber-Cypher, choose a server. Cyber-Cypher can only be used during a run on the chosen server.
data.title: Cyber-Cypher
Paricia
data.text:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to trash assets.
data.flavor: Perfect for flooding servers.

data.title: Self-modifying Code
data.text: 2[credit], [trash]: Search your stack for a program and install it (paying the install cost). Shuffle your stack.
data.flavor: "Make sure you tell the source code which executable you want it to compile into. One time I left my rig for a couple of minutes, and when I came back all of my files had been replaced with cat vids." -The Professor
Out there, the thousand-petaled lotus symbolizes detachment from illusion. In here, it is the birthplace of a higher consciousness. Something infinitely pure.
data.text:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to install programs (you cannot use Sahasrara to install a program that trashes Sahasrara).
data.title: Sahasrara

data.text: 1[credit]: Break barrier subroutine. 2[credit]: +1 strength for the remainder of this run.
data.title: Inti
data.flavor: "The Incans believed that the sun god resided in the Haman Pacha, the upper realm of the cosmos. They just didn't know that the Haman Pacha hadn't been discovered yet." -The Professor

data.title: Professional Contacts
data.text: [click]: Gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
data.flavor: Sometimes it doesn't matter how expensive your rig is, or how many credits are in your account, or even your skill as a runner. Most of the time, a simple handshake and a name are all you need.

data.title: Borrowed Satellite
data.text:
+1[link]
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
data.flavor: Some people have their own satellite receiver. Others have their own satellite.
"If you know the source code you can write to beat it, or just rejigger it a little and make it yours. That works, too." -Exile
data.title: Ice Analyzer
data.text:
Whenever the Corp rezzes a piece of ice, place 1[credit] on Ice Analyzer.
You may use credits on Ice Analyzer to install programs.

data.title: Dirty Laundry
data.text: Make a run. After the run is completed, gain 5[credit] if it was successful.
data.flavor: The data was better than she could have ever imagined. This Santiago fellow really knew what he was doing. She began to imagine the havoc she could wreak at the upcoming charity dinner…

data.text:
Place 8[credit] from the bank on Daily Casts when it is installed. When there are no credits left on Daily Casts, trash it.
Take 2[credit] from Daily Casts when your turn begins.
data.title: Daily Casts
data.flavor: "We say 'cyber-terrorist', they hear 'underground celebrity.'" -Michael Muhama, professional expert.
Just me, a cup of YucaBean, and last night's Hong Kong Trunk sniffed packets. I call that a good morning.
data.title: Same Old Thing
data.text: [click], [click], [trash]: Play an event from your heap (paying its play cost).

data.title: The Source
data.text:
The advancement requirement of all agendas is increased by 1.
As an additional cost to steal an agenda, you must pay 3[credit].
Trash The Source when an agenda is scored or stolen.
data.flavor: A dangerous game, but well worth playing.

data.text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Forfeit an agenda. If you do, give the Corp 1 bad publicity.
data.title: Frame Job

fr.flavor: "Prendre le contrôle de bioroïdes n'est pas impossible, contrairement à ce que prétend Haas-Bioroïd. Mais c'est dangereux." - Noise
fr.title: Coup Monté
fr.text:
Dépensez [click] comme coût additionnel pour jouer cet événement.
Renoncez à un projet. Si vous le faites, donnez 1 pion Mauvaise Presse à la Corpo.

data.flavor: "Bioroid intrusion isn't impossible, despite the bluster of Haas-Bioroid. But it is dangerous." -Noise

fr.text: [click]: Hébergez le Pion sur la glace périphérique d'un serveur central. À chaque fois que vous réussissez un piratage, si le Pion est hébergé sur une glace, déplacez le sur la glace directement après celle qui l'héberge actuellement, si possible; sinon, effacez le Pion et installez un programme Caïssa de votre main ou de votre tas, en ignorant tous les coûts.
fr.title: Pion

data.text: [click]: Host Pawn on an outermost piece of ice protecting a central server. Whenever you make a successful run while Pawn is hosted on a piece of ice, move Pawn to the piece of ice directly after the current ice hosting Pawn, if able; otherwise, trash Pawn instead and install a Caïssa program from your grip or heap, ignoring all costs. Errata from FAQ 3.0.1
data.title: Pawn

fr.text: [click]: Hébergez la Tour sur une glace qui n'héberge pas de Caïssa. Si elle est déjà hébergée, la Tour ne peut-être hébergée que sur un glace qui protège ce serveur ou sur une glace à la même position (en comptant à partir de la glace centrale) protégeant ce serveur. Le coût d'activation de chaque glace protégeant ce serveur est augmenté de 2.
fr.title: Tour

data.text: [click]: Host Rook on a piece of ice not hosting a Caïssa. If already hosted, Rook can be hosted only on ice protecting this server or on ice in the same position (counting from the innermost spot) protecting another server. The rez cost of each piece of ice protecting this server is increased by 2.
data.title: Rook

fr.title: Otage
fr.text: Dépensez [click] comme coût additionnel pour jouer cet événement. Cherchez une relation dans votre pile, révélez-la et ajoutez la à votre main. Vous pouvez installer cette relation (en payant son coût d'installation). Mélangez votre pile.

data.text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click]. Search your stack for a connection, reveal it, and add it to your grip. You may install that connection (paying its install cost). Shuffle your stack.
data.title: Hostage

data.flavor: Simple in principle, a drip virus drains fractions of currency from their accounts into yours.

fr.text:
À chaque fois que la corpo dépense [click] pour piocher une carte ou gagner 1[credit] (hors capacité d'une carte), placez 1 pion Virus sur la Perfusion Gorman V1.
[click], [trash]: Gagnez 1[credit] pour chaque pion Virus sur la Perfusion Gorman V1.
fr.title: Perfusion Gorman V1
fr.flavor: Le principe est simple : le virus de perfusion draine des fractions de crédits de leurs comptes vers les vôtres.

data.title: Gorman Drip v1
data.text:
Whenever the Corp spends a [click] to draw 1 card or gain 1[credit] (not through a card ability), place 1 virus counter on Gorman Drip v1.
[click], [trash]: Gain 1[credit] for each virus counter on Gorman Drip v1.
1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using decoders.
data.title: Lockpick

fr.title: Rossignol
fr.flavor: "Au départ, je l'ai conçu pour quelqu'un d'autre, mais c'était tellement utile que j'ai décidé de le garder pour moi." - Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
fr.text: 1[recurring-credit] N'utilisez ce crédit que pour payer l'utilisation de décrypteurs.

data.flavor: "I originally designed it for someone else, but it was so useful I decided to keep it for myself." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey

data.text: Whenever you pass a piece of unrezzed ice, you may trash False Echo. If you do, the Corp must rez that ice or add it to HQ.
data.title: False Echo

fr.title: Écho Fantôme
fr.flavor: "Et si cette glace voulait être libre ?" - Rielle "Kit" Peddler
fr.text: À chaque fois que vous passez une glace désactivée, vous pouvez effacer l'Écho Fantôme. Si vous le faites, la corpo doit activer cette glace ou la mettre dans son QG.

data.flavor: "What if this ice wants to be free?" -Rielle "Kit" Peddler

fr.title: Motivation
fr.flavor: Les gens normaux - Les gens sains d'esprit - ne s'engagent pas dans la voie du cyber-crime. Qui peut dire ce qui motive un esprit dérangé ? Une impression de manque de respect, en échec personnel reproché à des forces extérieures, ou la toujours très populaire avarice ? - Michael Muhama, Réflexions sur le Cyber-crime
fr.text: Au début de votre tour, vous pouvez regarder la première carte de votre pile.

data.flavor: Normal people-sane people-do not embark on a life of cybercrime. Who can say what motivates the deranged mind? An imagined slight, personal failings blamed on external forces, or the ever-popular lust for money? -Michael Muhama, Musings on Cybercrime
data.text: When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of your stack.
data.title: Motivation
John Masanori
data.text:
The first time you make a successful run each turn, draw 1 card.
The first time you make an unsuccessful run each turn, take 1 tag.
data.flavor: "I've been logging online with babes all day. Don't worry, the connections are clean. I guarantee it."

fr.text:
Au premier piratage réussi de chaque tour, piochez une carte.
Au premier piratage raté de chaque tour, recevez 1 tag.
fr.flavor: "Je me suis connecté en ligne avec des poupées toute la journée. T'en fais pas, les connexions sont cleans. Je te le garantis"
fr.title: John Masanori

data.text: When you score Project Ares, the Runner trashes 1 of his or her installed cards for each advancement token on Project Ares over 4. If the Runner trashes at least 1 card, take 1 bad publicity.
data.title: Project Ares

fr.text:
Lorsque vous finalisez le Projet Arès, le Runner efface immédiatement 1 de ses cartes installées pour chaque pion Avancement au delà de 4 sur le Projet Arès.
Si le Runner efface au moins 1 carte, prenez 1 pion Mauvaise Presse.
fr.title: Projet Arès
fr.flavor: Qui voudrait déclencher une guerre ?

data.flavor: Who wants to start a war?
NEXT Design's ice provides the discerning business with a suite of ice that creates a daunting security presence for intruders.

fr.title: Bronze NEXT
fr.flavor: Les conceptions NEXT offrent aux entreprises prévoyantes un ensemble de glaces qui créent une présence sécuritaire redoutable pour les intrus.
fr.text: Le Bronze NEXT a +1 en force pour chaque glace NEXT activée. [subroutine] Arrêtez le piratage.

data.title: NEXT Bronze
data.text: NEXT Bronze has +1 strength for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice. [subroutine] End the run.

As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Reveal up to 5 cards in HQ to the Runner. Gain 2[credit] for each card revealed.
data.title: Celebrity Gift

fr.text:
Dépensez [click] comme coût additionnel pour jouer cette opération.
Révélez jusqu'à 5 carte de votre QG au Runner. Gagnez 2[credit] pour chaque carte révélée de cette façon.
fr.flavor: Lorsque Miranda Rhapsody a fait son apparition avec une girafe miniature, tout le monde en a immédiatement voulu une.
fr.title: Cadeau à une Célébrité

data.flavor: When Miranda Rhapsody showed up with a teacup giraffe, suddenly everybody wanted one.

data.title: Himitsu-Bako
data.text:
1[credit]: Add Himitsu-Bako to HQ.
[subroutine] End the run.
data.flavor: Himitsu-Bako is a simple ice barrier that appears as a digital puzzle box. What makes it special is the ease with which it can be uninstalled and installed in a different server, throwing up barriers in unexpected places and giving any intruder a curious feeling of déjà vu.

fr.title: Himitsu-Bako
fr.flavor: Himitsu-Bako est une simple barrière de glace qui ressemble à une boîte à puzzle digitale. Ce qui la rend spéciale est la facilité avec laquelle elle peut être installée et désinstallée dans différents serveurs, mettant des barrières à des endroits inattendus et donnant aux intrus une curieuse sensation de déjà-vu.
fr.text:
1[credit]: Mettez Himitsu-Bako dans votre QG.
[subroutine] Arrêtez le piratage.

data.flavor: "The thing about journalism is there's always a better story around the corner. Soon, they smelled blood elsewhere, and the world forgot about me. But I didn't forget." -The Professor

fr.flavor: "Ce qu'il faut savoir sur le journalisme, c'est qu'il y a toujours une meilleure histoire au coin de la rue. Bientôt, ils sentent l'odeur du sang ailleurs et le monde m'oublie. Mais moi, je n'oublie pas" - Le Professeur
fr.title: Diffamation
fr.text: Lorsque vous finalisez Diffamation, effacez 1 ressource (cet effet ne peut pas être prévenu).

data.title: Character Assassination
data.text: When you score Character Assassination, trash 1 resource (cannot be prevented).
[click]: Draw 2 cards. Remove Jackson Howard from the game: Shuffle up to 3 cards from Archives to R&D.
data.title: Jackson Howard

fr.title: Jackson Howard
fr.flavor: "C'est mon devoir de m'assurer que nos créations sont de parfaits compagnons d'édumusement pour les consommateurs de demain."
fr.text: [click]: Piochez 2 cartes. Retirez Jackson Howard du jeu : Mélangez jusqu'à 3 cartes des Archives dans R&D.

data.flavor: "It is my job to ensure our creations are the perfect companions and edutainment for tomorrow's consumers."

fr.title: Atteinte à la Vie Privée
fr.text:
Dépensez [click] comme coût additionnel pour jouer cette opération.
<trace>Traque 2</trace> Si la traque est réussie, révélez la main du Runner et effacez-en autant de ressources et/ou d'événements que la différence entre votre force et la force d'évasion du Runner. Si la traque est ratée, prenez 1 pion Mauvaise Presse.

data.title: Invasion of Privacy
data.text:
As additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
<trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, reveal the Runner's grip and trash a number of resources and/or events from it up to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded the Runner's link strength. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.

data.flavor: Pumping water into deep sea thermal vents produced huge amounts of energy. A profitable side effect.

fr.text: Lorsque vous finalisez la Fracturation Géothermique, placez 2 pions projet dessus. [click], pion projet hébergé : Gagnez 7[credit] et prenez 1 pion Mauvaise Presse.
fr.flavor: Envoyer de l'air dans les cheminées hydrothermales des abysses produisait d'énormes quantités d'énergie. Ce qui était un effet secondaire très rentable
fr.title: Fracturation Géothermique

data.title: Geothermal Fracking
data.text: Place 2 agenda counters on Geothermal Fracking when you score it. [click], hosted agenda counter: Gain 7[credit] and take 1 bad publicity.

fr.title: Essaim
fr.text:
Lorsque vous activez l'Essaim, prenez 1 pion Mauvaise Presse.
L'Essaim peut être avancé et gagne "[subroutine] Effacez 1 programme sauf si le Runner paye 3[credit]." pour chaque pion Avancement sur lui.

data.title: Swarm
data.text:
When you rez Swarm, take 1 bad publicity.
Swarm can be advanced and gains "[subroutine] Trash 1 program unless the Runner pays 3[credit]." for each advancement token on it.
Purge virus counters.
data.title: Cyberdex Trial

fr.text: Nettoyez tous les pions Virus.
fr.title: Période d'Essai Cyberdex
fr.flavor: Votre version d'essai gratuite vient d'expirer. Voulez-vous passer à la version complète ?

data.flavor: Your free trial expired. Upgrade to the full version?

fr.title: Sinistros
fr.flavor: "Le Sinistros des legendes est l'un des nombreux mythes du 'chien noir' que l'on trouve habituellement dans les communautés de langue anglaise ou gaélique. Ce qui est fascinant, c'est qu'il s'est propagé sur le réseau, où il continue à vivre sous forme de programme qui, comme le veut la légende, chasse les imprudents." - Le Professeur
fr.text:
Lorsque vous activez Sinistros, prenez 1 pion Mauvaise Presse.
[subroutine] Effacez 1 programme.

data.flavor: "The Grim of legend was one of many so-called 'black dog' myths common to Gaelic and English-speaking communities. What's fascinating is that it has propagated to the network, where it lives on as a program that, or so the story goes, hunts for the unwary." -The Professor
data.text:
When you rez Grim, take 1 bad publicity.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
data.title: Grim
Bishop
data.text: [click]: Host Bishop on a piece of ice not hosting a Caïssa. If already hosted, Bishop can be hosted only on ice protecting a central server if Bishop is on ice protecting a remote server, or on ice protecting a remote server if Bishop is on ice protecting a central server. Host ice has -2 strength.

fr.title: Bishop
fr.text: [click]: Hébergez le Fou sur une glace qui n'héberge pas de Caïssa. S'il est déjà hébergé, le Fou ne peut être hébergé que sur une glace qui protège un serveur central si le Fou est sur une glace qui protège un serveur distant, ou sur une glace protégeant un serveur distant si le Fou est sur une glace protégeant un serveur central. La glace hôte à -2 en force.

data.text:
Scheherazade can host any number of programs.
Whenever you install a program on Scheherazade, gain 1[credit].
data.title: Scheherazade

fr.text:
Schéhérazade peut héberger n'importe quel nombre de programmes. (le coût en mémoire des programmes hébergés comptre dans votre limite de mémoire.)
À chaque fois que vous installez un programme sur Schéhérazade, gagnez 1[credit].
fr.flavor: Installer 1001 programmes vous ferait entrer au Panthéon des Pirates… si une telle institution existait.
fr.title: Scheherazade

data.flavor: Installing 1001 programs puts you in the hacker hall of fame, or would if such an institution actually existed.

data.text: When your turn begins, gain 2[credit] and lose [click].
data.title: Hard at Work

fr.text: Au début de votre tour, gagnez 2[credit] et perdez 1[click].
fr.title: En Plein Boulot
fr.flavor: Noise avait décidé de retourner à l'école. Il avait postulé à des bourses de recherche dans quinze des plus prestigieuses universités. Qu'il avait ensuite piratées pour approuver ses candidatures. C'était l'heure du petit déjeuner.

data.flavor: Noise decided to go back to school. He applied for research grants at fifteen of the most prestigious universities. Then he hacked in and approved his applications. Breakfast time.

fr.text: Lancez un piratage. Vous pouvez débrancher lorsque vous rencontrez la première glace.
fr.title: Reconnaissance
fr.flavor: Comme dans le monde réel, il vaut parfois mieux envoyer un clone faire le sale boulot.

data.flavor: Just like in the real world, sometimes it is best to send in the clone to do the dirty work.
data.text: Make a run. You may jack out when you encounter the first piece of ice.
data.title: Recon

data.flavor: The copycat function should be used with extreme caution, or you might end up on the wrong side of cyberspace.

fr.title: Copieur
fr.flavor: La fonction du copieur devrait être utilisée avec beaucoup de précautions, sous peine de se retrouver à l'autre bout du cyberspace.
fr.text: À chaque fois que vous passez une glace, vous pouvez effacer le Copieur. Si vous le faites, choisissez un autre exemplaire activé de cette glace qui protège n'importe quel serveur. Le piratage continue comme si vous veniez de passer la glace choisie (votre piratage continue depuis cette nouvelle position).

data.title: Copycat
data.text: Whenever you pass a piece of ice, you may trash Copycat. If you do, choose another rezzed copy of that piece of ice protecting any server. The run continues as if you had just passed the chosen piece of ice (you are now running from the new position).

fr.title: Leviathan
fr.flavor: C'est très efficace, pour certaines grandes valeurs d'«efficace». L'avatar de baleine est soit bien pensé, soit une regrettable interprétation des heures de programmation, selon la personne à qui vous posez la question - Comment briser la glace, par BT
fr.text: 3[credit]: Neutralisez jusqu'à 3 routines verrou. 3[credit]: force +5.

data.flavor: It's efficient as all hell, for certain very large values of "efficient". The whale avatar is either a nice touch or a tragic misapplication of programmer man-hour, depending on who you ask. -BT's Guide to Icebreaking
data.text: 3[credit]: Break up to 3 code gate subroutines. 3[credit]: +5 strength.
data.title: Leviathan
Eureka!
data.text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Reveal the top card of your stack. You may install that card, lowering the install cost by 10[credit], if able; otherwise, trash it.
data.flavor: "I've got a surprise for you."

fr.text:
Dépensez [click] comme coût additionnel pour jouer cet événement.
Révélez la première carte de votre pile. Vous pouvez installer cette carte en diminuant son coût d'installation de 10[credit], si possible; sinon, effacez-la.
fr.title: Eurêka!
fr.flavor: "J'ai une surprise pour toi."

data.text: Whenever you make a successful run on Archives, instead of accessing cards you may choose 1 faceup card from Archives and add it to the top of R&D.
data.title: Record Reconstructor

fr.title: Reconstructeur d'Enregistrement
fr.flavor: "Pourquoi ces données sont-elles effacées ? Peut-être qu'ils ne veulent pas qu'on les trouve. Ou peut-être qu'elles sont inutiles. Ce sont des données inutiles que tu cherches." - Le Professeur
fr.text: À chaque fois que vous réussissez un piratage sur les Archives, au lieu d'accéder à des cartes, vous pouvez choisir une carte face visible des  Archives et la mettre sur R&D.

data.flavor: "Why is data deleted? Maybe they don't want it to be found. Or maybe it's just useless. The useless data is the kind you want." -The Professor

fr.flavor: Un VocoPAD est un appareil de connexion personnel dont on a enlevé la plupart des fonctions. Il sert surtout à faire des appels vocaux et à gérer vos contacts. La seule raison d'en avoir un est de vouloir rester anonyme, ce qui pour certaines personnes, est une raison bien suffisante.
fr.title: Vocopad Prépayé
fr.text:
1[recurring-credit]
N'utilisez ce crédit que pour payer des événements.
